required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Investigation of Food Effect and Gastric ph Increase on the Bioavailability of Faldapravir
clinical_study.official_title: Investigation of the Effect of Food and of Increased Gastric pH on the Relative Bioavailability of a Single Oral Dose of 240 mg Faldaprevir in an Open-label, Randomised, Three-way Cross-over Trial in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this trial is to investigate the effect of food and of gastric pH increase on the relative bioavailability of faldaprevir.

primary_outcome.measure: Faldaprevir: Area Under the Curve Over the Time Interval From 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-infinity)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1.5 hours (h) before drug administration and 0.5h, 1h, 1.5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h, 34h, 48h, 72h, 96h and 120h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the faldaprevir in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1.5 hours (h) before drug administration and 0.5h, 1h, 1.5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h, 34h, 48h, 72h, 96h and 120h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the faldaprevir in plasma In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.

secondary_outcome.measure: Faldaprevir: Area Under the Curve 0 to the Last Quantifiable Data Point (AUC0-tz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1.5 hours (h) before drug administration and 0.5h, 1h, 1.5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h, 34h, 48h, 72h, 96h and 120h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the faldaprevir in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. Healthy male and female subjects
Exclusion criteria:
1. Any relevant deviation from healthy condition

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This was a randomised open label, 3-way cross over study with three sequences. Faldaprevir administrations in each treatment period were separated by washout period of at least 14 days.

group.title: Faldaprevir/Faldaprevir+ OMP/Faldaprevir Fed
group.description: Faldaprevir: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration. Faldaprevir+ OMP: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration following multiple dosing of 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir. Faldaprevir fed: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less.

group.title: Faldaprevir Fed/ Faldaprevir/ Faldaprevir+ OMP
group.description: Faldaprevir fed: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less. Faldaprevir: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration (Reference treatment) faldaprevir+ OMP: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration following multiple dosing of 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir.

group.title: Faldaprevir+ OMP/ Faldaprevir Fed/ Faldaprevir
group.description: Faldaprevir+ OMP: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration following multiple dosing of 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir. Faldaprevir fed: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less. Faldaprevir: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration

baseline.population: Treated set (TS) including all subjects who received at least 1 dose of study drug

group.title: Entire Study Population
group.description: All subjects received all tested treatments in a randomised, open label, 3-way cross over study. The treatments were: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration (Reference treatment) Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less. Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration following multiple dosing of 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir. Drug administrations were separated by a washout period of at least 14 days

outcome.title: Faldaprevir: Area Under the Curve Over the Time Interval From 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-infinity)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the faldaprevir in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.
outcome.time_frame: 1.5 hours (h) before drug administration and 0.5h, 1h, 1.5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h, 34h, 48h, 72h, 96h and 120h after drug administration
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: Included all treated subjects that provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary endpoint without important protocol violations with respect to the statistical evaluation of the pharmacokinetic endpoints.

group.title: Faldaprevir in Fasting
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration (Reference treatment)

group.title: Faldaprevir After a High-fat Meal
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less

group.title: Faldaprevir and Omeprazole
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration following multiple dosing of 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir

measure.title: Faldaprevir: Area Under the Curve Over the Time Interval From 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-infinity)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the faldaprevir in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: Included all treated subjects that provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary endpoint without important protocol violations with respect to the statistical evaluation of the pharmacokinetic endpoints.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: no formal testing, investigation of bioavailability
analysis.method_desc: Ratio calculated as Faldaprevir after a high-fat meal divided by Faldaprevir in fasting
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the geometric coefficient of variation (gCV)

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: no formal testing, investigation of bioavailability
analysis.method_desc: Ratio calculated as Faldaprevir and Omeprazole divided by Faldaprevir in fasting
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the geometric coefficient of variation (gCV)

outcome.title: Faldaprevir: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax)
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the faldaprevir in plasma In this endpoint, the "measured values" show inter-individual variabilities, whereas the statistical analyses show intra-individual variabilities.
outcome.time_frame: 1.5 hours (h) before drug administration and 0.5h, 1h, 1.5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h, 34h, 48h, 72h, 96h and 120h after drug administration

reported_events.time_frame: From first drug administration until the end of trial visit, up until 20 days

group.title: Faldaprevir in Fasting
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast prior the drug administration (Reference treatment)

group.title: Faldaprevir After a High-fat Meal
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was administered orally 30 minutes (min) after a standard high-fat, high-caloric meal was served. The meal had to be completely consumed within 25 min or less

group.title: Faldaprevir and Omeprazole
group.description: Single dose of 240 mg faldaprevir in a form of two soft gelatin capsules was coadministered orally with 40 mg Omeprazole following an overnight or at least 10 hours (h) fast

group.title: Omeprazole
group.description: 40 mg omeprazole once daily for 4 days prior the first dose of faldaprevir

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
